entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Flurries at times heavy beginning before morning. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
